title: 那些权限是禁BACK HOME TP 悬赏100
txt_content: {:10_518:}话不多说如题反正就是禁 所有传送   回答好加分.我主要是用在小游戏上的！

replies.author: soratai
replies.txt_content: mangaddp XXX -essentials.* 为用户组XXX减少essentials.*权限

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
essentials.tp
essentials.tpa
essentials.home
essentials.back
如果要禁止可以直接删掉或者添加带负号的权限如-essentials.tp

replies.author: Hero_rix
replies.txt_content:
-essentials.tpa
-essentials.tpahere
等等，楼主应该会了吧，-essentials.指令

replies.author: 小葵花
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder -essentials.tp     
mangaddp builder -essentials.home
mangaddp builder -essentials.back
求最佳

/mangaddp Builder(这是默认的玩家权限组，如果你有修改默认权限组就用你修改的) -essentials.tp 
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.home
/mangaddp Builder -essentialse.back
输入这些指令就可以禁止默认权限组玩家的home tp back的权限
